name: Cozy Cabin: Coffee Boutique
description:
Cozy Cabin: Coffee Boutique is a tycoon coffee making simulation game primarily inspired by wholesome games like Animal Crossing & Stardew Valley. 

You’ve inherited your grandparents homely cabin after they hit the jackpot and started their own money filled adventures! After packing your belongings and moving into the cabin, you decide to start your own coffee shop. Do you have what it takes to get business up and running while connecting with your new and magical customers? Let’s put you to the test!

This game is being developed by Poly Blossom (LLC pending). We are a small group of Indie developers who were brought together by our local college's Game Design program.  

Cozy Cabin is still in early development and has been submitted to the IndieCade games festival. Even after submission, we still want to continue development to the point of publishing! This project started in January of 2022 as a class project. We are so excited to continue development and to show you all our love of games and coffee through Cozy Cabin: Coffee Boutique!

Follow us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/cozycabincoffeeboutique/

Planned updates: 

Controller support.

VR support.

Additional machines.

More Regular NPCs

More drink variations.

Expanded days and weeks for greater customer interaction and tycoon experience.

Expanded dialog trees.

Expanded purchasing abilities with the shop.
